name: Intercity Truck Simulator - LITE
description:
* Realistic Driving feel
* 55+ more cargo types (Lite Included 6 cargo types)
* 100+ more world cities (Lite included 1 location)
* 9 different trailer types (Lite Included 3 trailer types
* Europe Style or American Style Truck types.
* Gamepad Support
* Repair, Eating, Fuel Station operations
* Earning Money with missions and Spend Money for your needs
* Traffic Accident, Truck Damage, Cargo Damage, Traffic Lights or Traffic infringement system (Lite not included Traffic system)
